Lingatthavivarana：A Pāli grammatical work by Subhūtacandana，a monk of Pagan．

Two Commentaries on it were written，

the Lingatthavivaranappakāsaka by Ñānasāgara and the Lingatthavivaranatīkā by Uttama． A work called Lingatthavivaranavinicchaya，by an unknown author，is also mentioned．Gv．63，65，67，72，73，75； Bode，op．cit．，22，n．1．
